# [Interview #403: AOL Chat 2, Entry #22](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=403#22)

#### Question

Could Aviendha be pregnant? ...enquiring minds want to know!

#### Robert Jordan

Enquiring minds can read and find out.
